name: Alma (itch) (Micael Sampaio)
description:
This will be for sure the last time that I try to make a diney movie in two days :) 
Once again, I overscoped a lot and I could not finish all my ideias.

Enjoy the game, it was made fot the gmtk jam 2021, all the assets and code were made for the jam, sounds and music I used free sounds.

PS: When it says W/S To Move is A/D my dislexia kicked in.

Game Models are on sketchfab to download for free:

Old Man

Old Woman

https://sketchfab.com/micaelsampaio/models
